page.title: 07OTTERSWIFT COTTAGE
page.content: Otterswift Cottage was built in 1715 and Mrs Ashby has lived there for 8 years. All Junior A went down to interview her about her life in Billinge. She told us everything she knew about Billinge. We asked her things like why is your house called Otterswift Cottage, she said that there might have been otters down by the farm. We also asked her how many pets she has, she has got 2 dogs,seven cats and twenty hens shared with next door. The cottage now has modern facilties but is no longer a listed building. At one time the cottage was used to house horses and cows but people have lived in it for nearly thirty years. After the successful interview Mrs Ashby showed us round her cottage and then it was time to go back to school in the minibus.
